title: Strengthening Practical Instructional Design Competencies: Language Proficiency Enhancement Project Based on Quantum Learning Perspectives

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the language acquisition process from a systemic perspective according to the "holistic interaction" principle presented from a quantum learning perspective.
Learners can develop and apply at least three language strategies suited to real work contexts through PBL activities on a virtual collaboration platform.
Learners can design personalized language learning roadmaps based on the concept of infinite potential and sustain self-directed learning.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
